turn_rate_max.description: Max turn rate (in degrees) to use when modulating speed. The actual turn rate will get clamped to this.

move_speed_multiplier_min.description: Move speed multiplier to apply if turn_rate / turn_rate_max is 0.

move_speed_multiplier_max.description: Move speed multiplier to apply if turn_rate / turn_rate_max is 1.

move_speed_max.description: Max move speed we can ever modulate to.
